#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long int n,k,i,s,h;
	while(scanf("%ld",&n)!=EOF&&scanf("%ld",&k)!=EOF)
	{
		long int a[n+1],st=1,pr=n;
		for(i=n;i>=1;i--)a[i]=n-i+1;
		while(st!=n)
		{
			h=pr-(k%(n-st+1))+1;
			if(h<st)
			h=n-(st-h)+1;
			if(h>n)
			h=st+h-n-1;
			for(i=h-1;i>=st;i--)a[i+1]=a[i];
			st++;
			pr=h;
			//for(i=st-1;i<=n;i++)printf("%ld ",a[i]);
			//printf("\n");
		}
		printf("%ld\n",a[st]);
	}
	return 0;
}
